summary:
Emabalatec is a company with over 1000 employees and its functioning in IT infrastructure is 24x7. 

Below follows some activities during my staying at the company. 

  • Administration Server on Linux (Debian, Suse) and Windows Server 2003 

• Administration Firewall and proxy (iptables / Squid) 

 • Redundant WAN links with iproute2 

  • Implementation of GigaBit network, configuration of CISCO switch 

  • Virtualization of servers on VMware ESXi platform, Openfire (Corporate Messenger), Customization Ocomon system (called Opensource), Joomla (intranet), Postfix as internal relay. 

  • Implementation Document Server (Cedoc) in Linux environment. 

  • Provision of a new structure of ERP servers and storage, due to business growth.
